title: NewsBreak: Trump Says He Could Destroy Turkey’s Economy
text:
NewsBreak: Trump Says He Could Destroy Turkey’s Economy

Politics 4 hours ago (Oct 07, 2019 12:10PM ET)

© Reuters. Investing.com - President Donald Trump warned in a tweet Monday about severe economic consequences for Turkey if the country does anything “off limits” following the White House’s announcement of U.S. troop withdrawal from Syria. “As I have stated strongly before, and just to reiterate, if Turkey does anything that I, in my great and unmatched wisdom, consider to be off limits, I will totally destroy and obliterate the Economy of Turkey (I’ve done before!),” Trump tweeted. The iShares MSCI Turkey ETF (NASDAQ: ) was down about 3% following the tweet. Critics of the White Houe decision have said that withdrawal of troops would open the door for a Turkish operation against Kurds in Syria.

NewsBreak: Trump Says He Could Destroy Turkey’s Economy
description: NewsBreak: Trump Says He Could Destroy Turkey’s Economy
